title: Bottomless Lava Bucket
summaries: The Bottomless Lava Bucket is an item that functions similarly to the standard Lava Bucket, except that it never runs out of Lava and can place it slightly faster than a regular lava bucket (especially when moving the cursor around while filling). It is obtained as a rare drop from fishing in lava.
This is the lava counterpart of the Bottomless Water Bucket, Bottomless Honey Bucket, and Bottomless Shimmer Bucket.

statistics.Tooltip:
Contains an endless amount of lava
Can be poured out
statistics.Sell: 10
